homepage.teaser_text1: RAF Performance, a car specialist in Lower Saxony.
homepage.teaser_text2: We specialize in Volkswagen Group vehicles (Audi, Volkswagen, Skoda, Seat, Lamborghini, and Porsche).
homepage.teaser_text3: We offer engine repairs, bodywork, and special conversions and retrofits.
homepage.teaser_text4: Simply contact us, and we'll find a solution.
homepage.teaser_text5: Your qualified car mechanic will always find a solution.
